mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, a.record_id as examineRecordId, a.create_user as create_user_id, b.`name`, b.examine_type,
c.`name` AS catagory, c.contract_id AS catagory_id, c.order_date, d.customer_id as catagory_cite_id, d.customer_name as catagory_cite_name
d.number AS catagory, d.receivables_id AS catagory_id, d.return_time, c.contract_id as catagory_cite_id, c.name as catagory_cite_name
d.invoice_apply_number AS catagory, d.invoice_id AS catagory_id, d.real_invoice_date, c.contract_id as catagory_cite_id, c.name as catagory_cite_name
FROM wk_crm_examine_log AS e LEFT JOIN wk_crm_examine_record AS a ON e.record_id = a.record_id LEFT JOIN wk_crm_examine AS b ON a.examine_id = b.examine_id
LEFT JOIN wk_crm_contract AS c ON c.examine_record_id = a.record_id AND b.category_type = '1' LEFT JOIN wk_crm_customer as d on c.customer_id=d.customer_id
LEFT JOIN wk_crm_receivables AS d ON d.examine_record_id = a.record_id AND b.category_type = '2' LEFT JOIN wk_crm_contract AS c ON d.contract_id = c.contract_id
LEFT JOIN wk_crm_invoice AS d ON d.examine_record_id = a.record_id AND b.category_type = '3' LEFT JOIN wk_crm_contract AS c ON d.contract_id = c.contract_id
WHERE e.log_id IN ( SELECT MAX(log_id) FROM wk_crm_examine_log WHERE
1=1
examine_user = #{userId}
and examine_status = 0 and is_recheck !=1
and examine_status != 0 and is_recheck = 0
and ((examine_status = 0 and is_recheck !=1) or examine_status != 0)
GROUP BY record_id )
and c.contract_id is not null
and d.receivables_id is not null
and d.invoice_id is not null
order by create_time desc
